caption.title: Autotrophic respiration response curves.
caption.p: Plots of normalized growing season autotrophic respiration versus standardized soil moisture for a baseline (1971–2000) ( a-d) and future period (2056–2085) ( e-h) in the GLACE-CMIP5 reference scenario. Details on the normalization and standardizations can be found in the Methods. Probability density functions of the soil moisture data are plotted at the top of the x-axes.
